title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Analyze different propulsion systems used in modern rockets and their performance under varying atmospheric conditions.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Study the combustion processes within a rocket engine and model the efficiency of fuel combustion using provided simulation tools.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design an optimized rocket nozzle, taking into account fluid dynamics and thermodynamics to maximize thrust.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: A multiple-choice quiz testing your knowledge of key aerodynamic principles, including lift, drag, and flow patterns.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Analyze airflow over a wing in a wind tunnel experiment and compare the results with theoretical predictions.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Calculate the heat transfer in a supersonic flow scenario, considering both convective and conductive effects.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a structural frame for a spacecraft, ensuring that it meets strength, weight, and material constraints.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Perform calculations for orbital insertion and station-keeping maneuvers, considering gravitational influences and fuel constraints.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: A comprehensive exam covering systems engineering concepts, including project lifecycle, risk management, and systems integration.
